point module¶

class point.Point(x, y, xmove, ymove, color)¶

Bases: multiprocessing.context.Process

__init__(x, y, xmove, ymove, color)¶

Initializes the point with different properties.

Parameters:
  • x – the x coordinate of the start position
  • y – the y coordinate of the start position
  • xmove – the x range of space in which the point can move
  • ymove – the y range of space in which the point can move
  • color – the color as a tuple in (R, G, B) format
join(timeout=None)¶

Ends the point process

Parameters:timeout – the timeout
Returns:None
run()¶

Manages the point’s position

Returns:None
